Name: id
Description: Record ID.

Name: dur
Description: Record total duration.

Name: proto
Description: Transaction protocol.

Name: service
Description: Such as http, ftp, smtp, ssh, dns and ftp-data.

Name: state
Description: Indicates to the state and its dependent protocol (such as ACC, CLO and CON).

Name: spkts
Description: Source to destination packet count.

Name: dpkts
Description: Destination to source packet count.

Name: sbytes
Description: Source to destination transaction bytes.

Name: dbytes
Description: Destination to source transaction bytes.

Name: rate
Description: Ethernet data rates transmitted and received.

Name: sttl
Description: Source to destination time to live value.

Name: dttl
Description: Destination to source time to live value.

Name: sload
Description: Source bits per second.

Name: dload
Description: Destination bits per second.

Name: sloss
Description: Source packets retransmitted or dropped.

Name: dloss
Description: Destination packets retransmitted or dropped.

Name: sinpkt
Description: Source interpacket arrival time (mSec).

Name: dinpkt
Description: Destination interpacket arrival time (mSec).

Name: sjit
Description: Source jitter (mSec).

Name: djit
Description: Destination jitter (mSec).

Name: swin
Description: Source TCP window advertisement value.

Name: stcpb
Description: Source TCP base sequence number.

Name: dtcpb
Description: Destination TCP base sequence number.

Name: dwin
Description: Destination TCP window advertisement value.

Name: tcprtt
Description: TCP connection setup round-trip time, the sum of synack and ackdat.

Name: synack
Description: TCP connection setup time, the time between the SYN and the SYN_ACK packets.

Name: ackdat
Description: TCP connection setup time, the time between the SYN_ACK and the ACK packets.

Name: smean
Description: Mean of the flow packet size transmitted by the src.

Name: dmean
Description: Mean of the flow packet size transmitted by the dst.

Name: trans_depth
Description: Represents the pipelined depth into the connection of http request/response transaction.

Name: response_body_len
Description: Actual uncompressed content size of the data transferred from the server’s http service.

Name: ct_srv_src
Description: No. of connections that contain the same service and source address in 100 connections according to the last time.

Name: ct_state_ttl
Description: No. for each state according to specific range of values for source/destination time-to-live.

Name: ct_dst_ltm
Description: No. of connections of the same destination address in 100 connections according to the last time.

Name: ct_src_dport_ltm
Description: No of connections of the same source address and the destination port in 100 connections according to the last time.

Name: ct_dst_sport_ltm
Description: No of connections of the same destination address and the source port in 100 connections according to the last time.

Name: ct_dst_src_ltm
Description: No of connections of the same source and the destination address in in 100 connections according to the last time.

Name: is_ftp_login
Description: If the ftp session is accessed by user and password then 1 else 0.

Name: ct_ftp_cmd
Description: No of flows that has a command in ftp session.

Name: ct_flw_http_mthd
Description: No. of flows that has methods such as Get and Post in http service.

Name: ct_src_ltm
Description: No. of records of the srcip in 100 records according to the ltime.

Name: ct_srv_dst
Description: No. of connections that contain the same service and destination address in 100 connections according to the last time.

Name: is_sm_ips_ports
Description: If source and destination IP addresses equal and port numbers equal then, this variable takes value 1 else 0.

Name: attack_cat
Description: The name of each attack category.

Name: label
Description: Normal (0) or attack (1) label.
